class.name: OpenXRMlMarkerDetectorArucoSettings
class.experimental: Marked as experimental due to lack of community validation on Magic Leap devices.

members.member: The ArUco dictionary name from which markers will be detected.

The physical length of one side of a marker in meters. A higher localization accuracy may be obtained by specifying the marker size. This value is ignored if [member estimate_aruco_length] is set to [code]true[/code].
If set to [code]true[/code] the detector will estimate the size of the marker.

constants.constant: 4 by 4 pixel Aruco marker dictionary with 50 IDs.
4 by 4 pixel Aruco marker dictionary with 100 IDs.
